item.description:
If you are in the area between Christmas and New Years, come out to The Half Door Pub in Quincy for drinks and appetizers on Friday, December 29th at 7:00 p.m.

The Half Door Pub is located at 1514 Hancock Street in Quincy Center.

There is plenty of parking in the parking lot behind the Hancock Street stores.

I will send my cell phone number out prior to the event.

Hope to see you there!

Organizer(s): Jennifer


Please Note:
Fee: $1pp
Please finalize your RSVP no later than Friday morning. If you RSVP "Maybe" please finalize no later than Thursday morning to allow others to RSVP in the affirmative.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Come Out for Drinks and Appetizers!
